articles.title: Weekly jobless claims fell to 166,000 last week, the lowest level since 1968 - CNBC
articles.description: Initial filings for unemployment dropped to 166,000, well below the Dow Jones estimate of 200,000 and 5,000 below the previous week's total
articles.content:
The labor market tightened further last week, with initial jobless claims falling to their lowest level in more than 53 years, the Labor Department reported Thursday.
